description.english: Annoy your friends on their daily commute.

description.english: Rejected Spade Kam's kindness.

description.english: Thanks for playing Monospaced Lovers! For real this time.
description.schinese: 感谢游玩《二进制恋人》！这次是真的。
description.spanish: ¡Gracias por jugar a Monospaced Lovers! ¡De verdad, esta vez!
description.russian: Спасибо, что прошли Monospaced Lovers! Теперь точно.
description.japanese: モノスペースド・ラバーズを最後まで遊んでくれてありがとう！
description.portuguese: Obrigado por jogar Monospaced Lovers! De verdade dessa vez.
description.turkish: Monospaced Lovers'ı deneyimlediğin için teşekkür ederiz! Cidden ama bak!

description.latam: ¡Gracias por jugar a Monospaced Lovers! ¡De verdad, esta vez!
description.tchinese: 感謝遊玩《二進位戀人》！這次是真的。
